doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes advertisement poster for artist's proofs of Donald Baechler's Red Coral (2004); Gabrielle Basilico (2004) at MIT galleries; Dan Colen Secrets and Cymbals, Smoke and Scissors (My Friend Dash's Wall in the Future) (2006) at Deitch Projects; Dan Colen Blowin' in the Wind (2012) at Gagosian; Gregory Crewdson Sanctuary (2011) at Gagosian Rome; newspaper format guide for Ann Hamilton the event of a thread (2012) at Park Avenue Armory; Tim Hawkinson (2009) at Pace/Wildenstein; Jasper Johns Catenary (2005) at Matthew Marks; Joe Bradley Krasdale (2016) at Gagosian; Roy Lichtenstein Nudes (1994) at Leo Castelli; Agnes Martin The '80s: Grey Paintings (2011) at 534 West 25th Street; Steven Parrino (2007) at Gagosian; A.R. Penck Constructions (2004) at Michael Werner; Charles Seliger New Paintings (2006) at Michael Rosenfeld; Richard Serra To Whom It May Concern (1995) at Matthew Marks; Richard Serra Venice Notebook Series (2002) at Gemini; Christer Stromholm (2016) at Pace/MacGill; Thomas Struth (2015) at the Met; Robert Therrien (2008) at Gagosian; prospectus (2000) for book Phrase Book by Rick Moody, illustrated by Fred Tomaselli; Andy Warhol From the Sonnabend Collection (2009) at Gagosian.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> Oversize (1 of 3 folders)
